creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban 色道取組十二番)
text: The series opens with three couples enjoying each other's company with food and drinks. The finely appointed room is decorated with a large standing screen, arrangements of flowers, and a hanging scroll on display in the tokonoma (alcove). The blossoming plum chosen for the decorations and the closed shōji panels suggest that it is a cold season.
title: Frontispiece, from the series Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban)
